revision.text: Possibly: Xenophon's history of the affairs of Greece : in seven books: Being a continuation of the Peloponnesian War ; from the time where Thucydides ends, to the battel at Mantinea : To which is prefixed an Abstract of Thucydides, and a brief Account of the Land and Naval Forces of the Ancient Greeks. (London : Printed by R[alph]. H[olt]. for William Freeman over against the Devil Tavern by Temple-Bar, in Fleet-Street, 1685). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/926826598
